title: Singer, social activist Shahzad Roy calls on PM
content:
KARACHI, May 26 (APP): Prominent singer and social activist Shahzad Roy on Friday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here.
Shahzad Roy paid tribute to the prime minister for timely assistance and measures taken for the rehabilitation of the victims of floods that had hit the country last year.
Governor of Sindh Kamran Tessori also attended the meeting.
